visual_dna.composition: Centered figure with symmetrical natural elements
visual_dna.palette: Vibrant orange (#FF4500) 40%, Deep green (#228B22) 35%, plus warm forest tones
visual_dna.lighting: Soft, natural lighting with sun rays

image_composition_analysis.focal_points: Primary focus on character with ~70% saliency; harmonious background enhances setting
image_composition_analysis.typography_style: Elegant serif for titles, minimal text for mystique

source_analysis.prompt_reconstruction: Epic fantasy art, mythical warrior sitting in a serene forest, diffused natural lighting, vibrant orange and deep green color scheme, adventurous and mystical style --ar 16:9 --style raw

video_prompt_json.scene: enchanted forest with ambient nature sounds
video_prompt_json.lighting: soft, glowing with ambient sun rays
video_prompt_json.camera: slow pan from left to right revealing the forest
video_prompt_json.movement: gentle breeze effect in the trees, soft light transitions

transformation_instructions: make an ad for our company "sanjeevni" a "herb that give you power like hanuman ji" use the slogan in voice. use pan and zoom and animated movements
